## IpcMessageCommand

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/dev-hooks.ts" sourceLine="8" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents HMR inter-process communication messages.

```ts title="Signature"
interface IpcMessageCommand {
    event: HMREventType;
    path: string;
    id?: string;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### event

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/hmrevent-type#hmreventtype'>HMREventType</a>`}   />

The type of HMR event being communicated.
### path

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

The path associated with the HMR event.
### id

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`string`}   />

An optional identifier for the HMR event, used for acknowledgment.
